mapper.select: select u.name as lName,m.mprid as mprid,m.rid as rid,m.uid as uid,m.reg_condition as reg_condition,m.pre_apply_date as pre_apply_date,m.apply_date as apply_date,m.registration_date as registration_date,m.title as title,m.typeOfInvent as typeOfInvent from main_page_reg_info as m left join user as u on m.lid=u.uid where m.uid=#{uid} order by registration_date desc
select lid,mprid,rid,uid,reg_condition,pre_apply_date,apply_date,registration_date,title,typeOfInvent from main_page_reg_info where lid=#{uid} order by registration_date desc
mapper.update: update main_page_reg_info set lid=#{uid} where rid=#{rid}
update main_page_reg_info set title=#{title},typeOfInvent=#{typeOfInvent} where rid=(select start_rid from registration_patent where rid=#{rid})
update main_page_reg_info set pre_apply_date=#{pre_apply_date},apply_date=#{apply_date} where rid=(select start_rid from registration_patent where rid=#{rid})
mapper.select: select uid from user where id=#{userID}
